short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables wholesale vehicle buyers and sellers to easily participate in multiple Manheim Simulcast lanes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Benefits:
路 Capability to monitor all active Manheim Simulcast Live sales - even while looking at other websites
路 Highlighting watchlist vehicles currently up for sale and ability to opt-in to browser notifications
路 Countdown indicator on number of vehicles until watchlist vehicle hits the block
路 Quick search feature to find specific sales and vehicles

Note: To use the extension you must have a valid dealer login to Manheim.com.
